mapper.insert: insert into member(mid,mpw,mname,mnick,mtel,memail, mpro_img, mtype, menabled) values(#{mid},#{mpw},#{mname}, #{mnick},#{mtel},#{memail}, #{mpro_img}, #{mtype}, #{menabled})
mapper.select: select mid,mpw,mname,mnick,mtel,memail, mpro_img, mtype from member
mapper.update: UPDATE member set mpw=#{mpw}, mname=#{mname}, mtel=#{mtel}, memail=#{memail}, minfo=#{minfo}, mnick=#{mnick}, mpro_img=#{mpro_img} where mid = #{mid}
